text:
IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have executed this agreement
as of the day and year first above written.
THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
By_
(CONTRACTING OFFICER)
Title
Witness:
(CONTRACTOR)
Address:
By_
Note: In case of corporation,
witnesses not required but certi-
cate must be completed. Type or
print names under all signatures.
Title_
Address
CORPORATE CERTIFICATE
Note: Contractor, if a corporation, should cause the following certificate to
be executed under its corporate seal, provided that the same officer sha.ll not
execute both the contract and the certificate.
I,_do hereby certify that I am
the duly qualified_of the corporation named
herein as Contractor; that__
who signed this contract on behalf of the Contractor, was on that date the
_of said corporation; that this contract was duly
signed for and in behalf of said corporation by authority of its governing body,
and is within the scope of its corporate powers.
IN WITNESS WHEREOF I have hereunto affixed my hand and the Seal of
_on this, the
_day of_, 19_.
(Corporate Seal)
I A-4U5
6-20-58
(Signature)
USIA
